column1: Nandorin was the language of the Nandor
column2: those Teleri Elves who broke from the Great Journey east of the Misty Mountains. As Sindarin became the dominant Elvish tongue of Middle-earth
column5: was represented mainly in old place-names and Silvan Elves dialects developed under its influence.
